"If you are lucky enough to be born
with the freedom to make your own decisions,
it is your responsibility to
do work that matters."

Whether it's words, websites, or businesses, I only work
with people who want to make a positive change.

Full-stack Developer

I specialise in Ruby on Rails webapps, landing pages, portfolios, and
e-commerce stores. Balanced slightly more towards front-end than back-end. Check out some of my toys >>

Full-funnel Marketer

Experienced in content marketing, paid advertising, organic marketing, automation, analytics, and attribution models.

Human

I love rock-climbing, calisthenics, and any kind of movement sport. I also make an outrageous Pumpkin Risotto. Yes, you can have some.
